HELP_WELCOME: Bienvenido a la categoría {{category}}! Aquí encontrarás variedades de comandos para {{keywords}} tu servidor. Si necesitas ayuda adicional, no olvides unirte a nuestro servidor de [soporte]({{support}}). Además, para obtener más información sobre un comando en específico, utiliza **`{{prefix}}help <comando>`**.
HELP_INFO: Hey there! I'm [Kakashi]({{page}}), a multifunctional bot designed to bring life and fun to your Discord server. With a total of **`{{commands}}`** commands and **{{categories}}** exciting categories, I'm here to make your Discord experience unforgettable.
HELP_DESCRIPTION_MODERATION: Want to moderate your server? This section is for you!
HELP_DESCRIPTION_NINKENS: Want to adopt a ninken? You might be lucky...
HELP_DESCRIPTION_MUSIC: Listen to music within the Discord platform
HELP_DESCRIPTION_CONFIG: Configure your server with this category
HELP_DESCRIPTION_RPG: Are you a Naruto fan? This section is for you!
HELP_DESCRIPTION_UTIL: Some utility commands that could be useful.
HELP_DESCRIPTION_ACTIONS: Actions to interact or react with another person.
